TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_D_J_Augustin, title = D_J_Augustin, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/D_J_Augustin} }

S.FORM: D. J. Augustin hya'ga NBA pgnaw' mari' misuw qaniy, qutux sa p'aras mari' tpucing tay suruw. kawas te 1987, byacing te 11 ru 10 ryax qu hintgan nya, kinhulan nya ga Louisiana, hiya ga mnanak na ppzuy mari waya, ru squliq ka ppkal mari waya. 183 kunbun kinwagiq nya, 83 kunkin kin'suw nya, hiya ga qutux nqu spzyang blaq na ppzuy mari NBA. kawas 2008 mnwayaw ppzuy mari ga, mzyup squ te qutux lahuy ru te magal squliq, galun nqu Charlotte Bobcats. qnxan nya 2005 kawas 8 byacing msbehuy,qutux ngasal musa beh New Orleans . raral ga,hiya mqwas biru Hightower maki Missouri City,Texas hiya tmosoq mqwas biru maki Brother Martin pqwasan Biru. 2006 kawas 5 byacing 28 ryax,kwara Hightower seto sangka' tmasoq pqwasan Biru maki Toyota Center Houston,Texas . ryax na Brother Martin ,Augustin rasaw hlahuy magal sazing tequtux. Augustin ga four-star.2006 kawas kwara Amerika magal tetzyu point-guard ru tepayat qeru unro na squilq. pincyuwagan nya' pspngan mari sa may yugal yacing masuq mspung mari sa pspngan mari na maycyugal byacing lga cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' Lists of National Basketball Association players

D. J. Aogostin hya'ga NBA pgnaw' mari' misow qaniy, qotox sa p'aras mari' tpocing tay sorow. kawas te 1987, byacing te 11 ro 10 ryax qo hintgan nya, kinholan nya ga Looisiana, hiya ga mnanak na ppzoy mari waya, ro sqoliq ka ppkal mari waya. 183 konbon kinwagiq nya, 83 konkin kin'sow nya, hiya ga qotox nqo spzyang blaq na ppzoy mari NBA. kawas 2008 mnwayaw ppzoy mari ga, mzyop sqo te qotox lahoy ro te magal sqoliq, galon nqo Charlotte Bobcats. qnxan nya 2005 kawas 8 byacing msbehoy,qotox ngasal mosa beh New Orleans . raral ga,hiya mqwas biro Hightower maki Missoori City,Texas hiya tmosoq mqwas biro maki Brother Martin pqwasan Biro. 2006 kawas 5 byacing 28 ryax,kwara Hightower seto sangka' tmasoq pqwasan Biro maki Toyota Center Hooston,Texas . ryax na Brother Martin ,Aogostin rasaw hlahoy magal sazing teqotox. Aogostin ga foor-star.2006 kawas kwara Amerika magal tetzyo point-goard ro tepayat qero onro na sqoilq. pincyowagan nya' pspngan mari sa may yogal yacing masoq mspong mari sa pspngan mari na maycyogal byacing lga cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' Lists of National Basketball Association players
